elements.name: question1
elements.title: According to the explanatory video, what is crucial for a company to be able to pay its employees' wages? Write down your answer in one sentence.
elements.correctAnswer: Wages can only be paid if a company generates added value.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: When does the joinery in the video generate added value?
elements.correctAnswer: If the joinery finds people who are prepared to pay more for the finished chair than for the wood, nails, electricity and all other preliminary work, it generates added value.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: How is the added value calculated in the carpentry example?
elements.correctAnswer: Added value = sales price of the chair minus the cost of all preliminary work

elements.name: question3
elements.title: In the example of the joinery, to whom is the added value generated distributed and why?
elements.correctAnswer: Employees of the joinery, owners of the joinery and the state. Everyone involved has made a direct or indirect contribution to value creation.
